title: Broadway’s Aaron Lazar on Living With ALS, Filming ‘Countdown’ With Eric Dane and Launching New Podcast
summary: When Broadway star Aaron Lazar was cast for a guest spot on the Amazon MGM series “Countdown,” he wasn’t expecting to bond with star Eric Dane in the way that they did. “When I met Eric and he shook my hand, I could see and feel something was off,” Lazar tells me. “I asked him […]
